info.title: Zoho Analytics API
info.description: API for managing data in Zoho Analytics workspaces and views.

tags.name: Sharing & Collaboration APIs
tags.description: APIs for sharing views (reports and dashboards) with users, managing permissions, and removing sharing in Zoho Analytics.

get.description: Returns list of admins for a specified organization.
Returns list of admins for the specified workspace.

post.description: Adds admins for the specified workspace.

delete.description: Removes admins from the specified workspace.

get.description: Returns sharing details of all views in the specified workspace.

post.description: Shares the specified views in the workspace with users or groups with selected permissions.

delete.description: Removes view sharing from specified users or groups in the workspace.

put.description: Updates the existing sharing configuration for a view.

get.description: Returns permissions for the specified view.
Returns shared details of the specified views.

parameters.name: CONFIG
parameters.description: View IDs for which shared details need to be fetched.

get.description: Returns list of groups for the specified workspace.

post.description: Create a group in the specified workspace.

get.description: Returns details of the specified group.

post.description: Add users to the specified group.

delete.description: Remove users from the specified group.

org-id.name: ZANALYTICS-ORGID
org-id.description: Organization ID (can be obtained using Get Organizations API).

ShareViewsResponse.description: Empty response with HTTP 204 No Content

RemoveShareResponse.description: Empty response with HTTP 204 No Content

groupName.description: Name of the group to be created.

emailIds.description: List of email addresses to be added to the group.

inviteMail.description: Whether to send invitation mails. Default is false.

mailMessage.description: Message body of the invitation mail.

examples.mailMessage: You're invited to join the Zoho Analytics group.

groupId.description: Unique identifier of the created group.

emailIds.description: Email IDs of users to be added.

inviteMail.description: Whether to send invitation mails. Default is false.

emailIds.description: Email IDs of users to be removed.

notifyMail.description: Whether to send notification mails. Default is false.
